skinsrestorer.help_skin_set_other: Sets the skin for a target player.
skinsrestorer.help_skin_set_url: Sets the skin from an url.
skinsrestorer.help_skin_clear_other: Clears the skin of a target player.
skinsrestorer.help_skin_search: Search up a skin that you want
skinsrestorer.help_skin_update_other: Updates the skin of a target player.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_props: Displays the players current skin properties.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_apply_skin: Re-apply the skin for target player.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_create_custom: Create a custom server wide skin.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_set_skin_all: Set the skin to every player.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_apply_skin_all: Re-apply the skin to every player.
skinsrestorer.help_sr_purge_old_data: Purge old skin data from over x days ago.
skinsrestorer.error_skin_disabled: &4Error&8: &cThis skin is disabled by an administrator.
skinsrestorer.error_skinurl_disallowed: &4Error&8: &cThis domain has not been allowed by the administrator.
skinsrestorer.error_updating_skin: &4Error&8: &cAn error occurred while updating your skin. Please try again later!
skinsrestorer.error_updating_url:
&4Error&8: &cYou can't update custom url skins! 
&cRequest again using /skin url
skinsrestorer.error_updating_customskin: &4Error&8: &cSkin can't be updated because its custom.
skinsrestorer.error_invalid_urlskin:
&4Error&8: &cInvalid skin url or format, 
&cTry uploading your skin to imgur and right click 'copy image address' 
&cFor guide see: &c&oskinsrestorer.net/skinurl
skinsrestorer.error_ms_full: &4Error&8: &cMineSKin API timed out while uploading your &cskin. Please try again later.
skinsrestorer.error_ms_api_failed: &4Error&8: &cMineSkin API is overloaded, please try again later!
skinsrestorer.not_connected_to_server: &cYou are not connected to any server.
skinsrestorer.command_server_not_allowed: &cCommands have been disabled for the server {0}.
skinsrestorer.player_has_no_permission_s: &4Error&8: &cYou don't have permission to set this skin.
skinsrestorer.player_has_no_permission_u: &4Error&8: &cYou don't have permission to set skins by URL.
skinsrestorer.not_premium: &4Error&8: &cPremium player with that name does not exist.
skinsrestorer.invalid_player: &4Error&8: &c{0} is not a valid username or URL.
skinsrestorer.skin_cooldown: &4Error&8: &cYou can change your skin again in &e{0} &cseconds.
skinsrestorer.ms_updating_skin: &2Uploading skin, please wait... (This may take up some time)
skinsrestorer.generic_error: &4Error&8: &cAn error occurred while requesting skin data, please try again later!
skinsrestorer.wait_a_minute: &4Error&8: &cPlease wait a minute before requesting that skin again. (Rate Limited)
skinsrestorer.permission_command: Allows access to the main "/skin" commands.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_set: Allows access to change your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_set_url: Allows access to change your skin by url.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_clear: Allows access to clear your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_update: Allows access to update your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_search: Allows access to search your skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_gui: Allows access to open skins GUI.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand: Allows access to the main "/sr" commands.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_set_oth: Allows access to set a player skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_clear_o: Allows access to clear a player skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_command_update_: Allows access to update a player skin.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_dr: Allows access to removes a .SKIN file.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_pr: Allows access to get the skinprops of a player.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_ap: Allows access to re-apply the skin of a player.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_cr: Allows access to create a custom skin by url.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_ap: Allows access to apply a skin to all players.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_pu: Allows access to purge old skin data.
skinsrestorer.permission_admincommand_du: Allows access to upload server information via /sr dump.
skinsrestorer.permission_bypasscooldown: Bypasses any set cooldowns in the config.
skinsrestorer.permission_bypassdisabled: Allows access to disabled skins in the config.
skinsrestorer.permission_ownskin: Allows access to set your own skin.
skinsrestorer.skin_search_message:
&2You can find skins matching &a{0}&2 here: 
&ahttps://namemc.com/minecraft-skins/tag/{0} 

&2If no skins are found, you can always find some skins at https://namemc.com/minecraft-skins/tag 
You can set the skin using the skin link:
 /skin https://namemc.com/skin/
skinsrestorer.no_skin_data: &4Error&8: &cNo skin data acquired! Does this player have a skin?
skinsrestorer.outdated:
&4You are running an outdated version of SkinsRestorer!
&cPlease update to the latest version on Spigot: 
&ehttps://www.spigotmc.org/resources/skinsrestorer.2124/
